reviews.review: Portal and Portal 2 are timeless puzzle games that are must haves for every PC gamer. The characters/lore are really engaging and the gameplay/level design is very fun and innovative. If you have a friend, the co-op in Portal 2 is also a very fun playthrough as the dialogue between each of the characters is really entertaining as well as the additional portal gun making you think in different ways to solve the puzzles.
Portal 2 es un juego verdaderamente divertido y adictivo. La historia es fascinante y los personajes son entraÃ±ables de alguna manera u otra. Realmente recomendable.

almost cried at the end for no particular reason

This is one of the best if not THE best game I've ever played. The story is great, the replayability is great, and the flow of the game is smooth like butter. If you haven't, get this game. It is a phenomenal game and a great conclusion to the series.

Some chambers are fun, but the single player game was not as engaging as Portal 1 was.
The second act with the old-timey chambers was dull and the goop was annoying.

Overall feels like the game lost its umph.

If its the price of a cup of coffee its worth your 6 hours of play time

THIS GAME IS AMAZING!! It has so much potential with a story element, with super satisfying physics, allowing you to fling yourself across rooms. Such a cool game concept, with so much more to improve on, and each update makes it better and BETTER AND EVEN BETTER than before.

Es buen juego, mejoro varias cosas del Portal 1 ademas que puedes entrar a la workshop y descargar nuevos mapas, otra cosa genial es poder jugar en modo solo o en modo coop con una persona mas. GrÃ¡ficamente tambiÃ©n mejoro bastante y la historia es decente.. 
Recomendado. 8/10
